mapper.select: select ch.*, IF(my_cl.no, my_cl.no, 0) AS like_no, count(Distinct cl.no) AS like_count, count(distinct chat.no) AS chat_count, ro.room_id AS room_id from chunk AS ch LEFT JOIN chunk_like as cl ON ch.no = cl.chunk_no LEFT JOIN chunk_like as my_cl ON ch.no = my_cl.chunk_no AND my_cl.user_no = ${user_no} LEFT JOIN room as ro ON ro.chunk_no = ch.no LEFT JOIN chat as chat ON chat.room_no = ro.no where ch.section_no = ${section_no} GROUP BY ch.no ORDER BY no DESC
select * from chunk where group_num = ${group_num} AND layer = 1 ORDER BY content_order ASC
